relnotes.name: OBEX MTMs
relnotes.purpose: Message Type Module (MTM) plugins to Messaging Framework supporting OBEX over Bluetooth and Infrafred, client / server MTM implementation for each carrier with supporting utilities.
relnotes.defect: Converting SFL licence to EPL license.

deliverystep.name: Splitting mixed header files for Messaging

preq.title: Splitting mixed header files for Messaging

deliverystep.preq: Mixed header files will now contain only published All or published Partner or internal

relnotes.defect: resolved stray event posibility for CBtSrvMtm::StartCommandL.
resolved stray event posibility for CObexServerSendOperation::ConstructL.

defect.title: System build:Elfe32 warning in OBEX MTMs in M04835 vFuture build

relnotes.defect: Added EXPORT_C for definitions of functions whose declaration has IMPORT_C in btHeader.h but definition does not have EXPORT_C. Followed by abld freeze to freeze the new exported functions.

defect.title: Many (simple) syntax errors in messaging code

relnotes.defect: Removed the class prefix to the operator and constructor functions.

defect.title: KERN-EXEC 3 in !MsvServer when pushing object to challenging push server

relnotes.defect: Returning the new error code KErrIrObexPassWordEmpty, if password is provided empty.

defect.title: Use of LC function in TRAP in CBaseTestHarness::RunError

relnotes.defect: Replaced the LC function with L function in TRAP.
Added condition to differentiate the winscw and armv5 def files for case sensitive

defect.title: Add missing IM tags to Messaging public header files

relnotes.defect: Added IM tag for all given header files.

deliverystep.name: Messaging file name changes to support GNU compiler for Linux
